Package com.krab.lazy.nodes

Class AbstractNode

java.lang.Object
com.krab.lazy.nodes.AbstractNode
Direct Known Subclasses:
ButtonNode, FolderNode, SliderNode, TextNode, ToggleNode
public abstract class AbstractNode extends Object
A node in the GUI Tree representing one or more of the following - a folder of other nodes - a transient preview of some value - a directly adjustable value that is returned to the user
